alert.note: Alert for Centennial Mountains, Island Park (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 06 at 2:58PM MST until December 07 at 9:00PM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 9 PM THURSDAY ABOVE 6500 FEET... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected above 6500 feet. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 8 inches, with locally higher amounts in the backcountry mountains above pass level. Winds gusting as high as 35 MPH. * WHERE...The Centennial Mountains and Island Park region, including but not limited to Island Park, Raynolds Pass, and Targhee Pass. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 9 PM Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions and reduced visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commutes Thursday. Travel may be especially difficult over mountain passes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Visit 511.idaho.gov for the latest road conditions.
